scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:init: npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:init
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev -- -p 3001"
